      • getMedicationsFromCursor

        public static final MedicationList[] getMedicationsFromCursor(android.database.Cursor cursor)
        Converts a cursor to an array of Diary Note that this method is "mean and lean" with little error checking. It assumes that the projection used is DiaryItem.FULL_PROJECTION
        Parameters:
        cursor - A cursor loaded with Diary data
        Returns:
        populated array of Diaries
